name: Lord Moolah
response: Lord Moolah, the king of greed, is all about drilling, extracting, and refining until the land is dry as a bone. This troll loves nothing more than seeing black gold flow endlessly, even if it chokes the skies and fuels great fires (which he probably started with his butane lighter). Insurance? Bah! Lord Moolah would toss it into the nearest abyss if he could, preferably while slipping on a pile of stock charts. Pharma and crypto? Just annoyances, tolerated only because smashing them into paste requires too much effort—though he’s definitely kicking them down an abyss when no one’s looking.
